element.definition: The assessment made based on the result of the observation.  Intended as a simple compact code often placed adjacent to the result value in reports and flow sheets to signal the meaning/normalcy status of the result. Otherwise known as abnormal flag.
element.comment: The component interpretation applies only to the individual component value.  For an overall interpretation all components together use thes Observation.interpretation element.
element.requirements: For some results, particularly numeric results, an interpretation is necessary to fully understand the significance of a result.
